name: Parlor! Pro 5
overview: Parlor! Pro 5 is the fifth game of the series of the same name released for the Playstation console and is a gambling game that features 3 different gambling machines. The game features also a sort of a story mode (called "My Little Darling) in which the player is a pachinko gambler that one day receive a pet in his house and got to go around the different pachinko places and try to win a lot of money in the machines to buy new meals and items for his new pet. The game features different shops and gambling places to go.
